comments:

same problem with a 16x16x32 png here.
the interesting thing is that the file has been created by ImageLoader.save().

swt version 3.320

stack:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Invalid image
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3450)

as firefox claims the image is invalid this seems to be a different bug concerning  ImageLoader.save

The problem with the image from comment#1 is fixed in 3.3.

The problem from comment#3 is addressed by bug#172290.
